intro: Gelonium tenuifolium, commonly known as the narrow-leaf geranium, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It is characterized by its slender, pointed leaves and clusters of small, pink or purple flowers. The plant typically grows in well-drained soils and prefers full sun to partial shade. It is often used in ornamental gardening for its attractive foliage and blooms. Gelonium tenuifolium is also valued for its ability to thrive in dry conditions, making it a resilient choice for gardens.
